id: [Default] Access Revoke Request Submitted For Requested-For Identity
name: Access Revoke Request Submitted For Requested-For Identity
description: Sent to the identity whose access is being reviewed in an access revoke request.
subject: $requesterName Has Requested to Revoke Your Access.
body:
Dear ${requestedForIdentityName},

$requesterName has requested removal of your access from following items. If approvals are required, you will be notified when a decision is made about this access.

#foreach ( $type in ${requestedObjectDetailsByType.keySet()} ) $type:
    #foreach ( $detail in ${requestedObjectDetailsByType.get($type)} )
  • ${detail.name} #if($detail.removeDate) (Access Sunset Date: ${detail.removeDate}) #end
    • #end

#end

If you need more information about this request, please contact $requesterName for assistance.

Thanks,
The ${PRODUCT_NAME} Team
